site.slogan: An open source tool for forum & community. (Pre Alpha)

topic.rules:
• 1. To be a kind human, keep goodwill towards others
  • 2. It's a good habits to preview before posting.
  • 3. Welcome to share. Enjoy!

comment.custom: You need login before you can leave a comment!

home.forum: Public forum, you can talk anything here.
home.group: Private group, share your thoughts with couple of friends.

aside.rules:
• 1. Open Source on Github.
  • 2. Based on Golang, React and PostgreSQL.
  • 3. Model tested.
  • 4. Project Roadmap.
